message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive mid/small-cap session. Pharma (Laurus, Biocon, Lupin), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL), and telecom towers (IndusTower) led; PSU metals mixed with SAIL coiling just under breakout. Our book is steady; key into Monday: SAIL >145.2, IndusTower >414, BHEL >290. Manage LTF concentration with a tight trail near 289.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Coiling just below 145.2 resistance; high-volume continuation likely on a clean break. Initial stop ~137.5.", "price": 144.72},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Cleared 405 base intraday; next trigger zone 414–415 for momentum follow-through. Stop ~392 on fresh buys.", "price": 407.85},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Support held near 280; add only on a decisive move above 289–291. Stop on adds ~275–276.", "price": 281.5},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Add on retest", "reason": "Breakout holding above 1600; prefer entries on dip to 1605–1615 or strength >1660. Stop ~1515.", "price": 1626.3},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on breakout/dip", "reason": "Theme strong; add above 2833 with volume or on dip to 2720–2750. Risk marker ~2680 on new adds.", "price": 2760.2},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Momentum intact; trail stop near 965. Consider small add only on sustained break >1005.", "price": 997.05},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Trim/Trail", "reason": "Largest position (~30% of book) sitting on 289–291 support; trim into strength >300 or reduce on breakdown <289 to de-risk.", "price": 292.2},
    {"symbol": "BIOCON", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Pharma leadership broadening; continuation trigger above 423 with stop ~402–405.", "price": 417.0},
    {"symbol": "ASTRAL", "signal": "Buy on dip/strength", "reason": "Constructive pullback to 1548–1555 support; alternatively buy strength >1593. Stop ~1528.", "price": 1550.6},
    {"symbol": "TATACOMM", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Strong close near highs; continuation above 1905–1910 opens room higher. Stop ~1848 on fresh buys.", "price": 1888.7},
    {"symbol": "HAL", "signal": "Buy on retest", "reason": "Defense leadership; look for controlled dips to 4680–4710 or strength >4772. Stop on fresh buys ~4590.", "price": 4751.0},
    {"symbol": "MUTHOOTFIN", "signal": "Buy-the-dip", "reason": "High-momentum trend; prefer entries on pullback to 3350–3370 with stop ~3280.", "price": 3393.1}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Risk control if 289 support fails; reduce concentration and protect gains.", "quantity": 8, "price": "SL-M 288.80"},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Breakout add using available cash; diversify into PSU metals momentum.", "quantity": 6, "price": "Buy stop 145.20; LMT 146.20; SL 137.50"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 969.8,
    "total_value": 27433.05,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2760.20)",
      "LTF: 28 units @ 275.59 (CMP 292.20)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 419.45 (CMP 419.80)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (CMP 997.05)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ 265.49 (CMP 281.50)",
      "NHPC: 30 units @ 81.48 (CMP 81.46)",
      "SAIL: 10 units @ 144.05 (CMP 144.72)",
      "CDSL: 1 units @ 1600.90 (CMP 1626.30)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma leadership: LAURUSLABS, BIOCON, LUPIN, ALKEM, WOCKPHARMA strong; prefer adds on strength or controlled dips; avoid chasing extended candles.",
    "Exchanges/depositories: BSE constructive; CDSL holding >1600; MCX extended—favor dips only.",
    "Telecom towers: INDUSTOWER basing/attempted breakout; clean trigger above 414–415.",
    "PSU metals: SAIL coiling under 145.2; HINDCOPPER steady but late-stage—prefer dips with tight stops.",
    "NBFCs: LTF at key 289–291 support—trail tight; ABCAPITAL steady near 328–335; MUTHOOTFIN momentum on dips.",
    "Defense/PSU: BHEL holds 280s—add only >289–291; BEL range 414–430—needs push >429–432; HAL trend strong—buy on retests.",
    "IT/ER&D: KPITTECH resilient; PERSISTENT/MPHASIS soft; COFORGE basing—wait for strength.",
    "Discretionary/Staples: ASTRAL near dip-buy zone 1548–1555; JUBLFOOD needs >589; TRENT softer; DABUR/MARICO range-bound.",
    "Real estate/infra: PRESTIGE firm; OBEROIRLTY steady; RVNL/IRCON base-building.",
    "Utilities/Renewables: NHPC and SJVN range 80–83; NTPCGREEN needs a range break >100.",
    "High-volume movers: ASHOKLEY breakout on heavy volume—watch for follow-through; IDEA speculative—avoid chasing.",
    "Risk controls (current holdings): LTF trail 288.8; BSE reference 2680 (for any new add risk); BEL 404; BHEL 275–276; LAURUS 965; NHPC 79.9; SAIL 137.5; CDSL 1515.",
    "Execution: If Monday gaps >0.7%, let first 20–30 minutes set ranges; use pullback entries, avoid chasing opening spikes."
  ]
}
